track.name: Slow Dancing in a Burning Room
comments: Nothing beats the Where the light is version [4]
Hard to believe that this song was introduced to us about 7 years ago. Still sounds fresh, heartbreaking.
One of the most heartbreaking songs ever written. [3] <3
One of the most heartbreaking songs ever written. [3]
On an album filled with awesome songs, I pick this one as my favorite.
my dear we're slow dancing in a burning room. oh god, this lyric is so perfect

What i get from the lyrics, is that he's describing a love story of two people who aren't taking the fact that their relationship is spiraling out of control seriously. They're underestimating the seriousness of it (slow dancing in a burning room). For if a room were burning, last thing you'd do is slow dance in it, you'd get out! Not these two people though.
One of the most heartbreaking songs ever written. [2]
cant describe how much i love this song ♥ [2]
nothing beats the Where the light is version [3]
One of the most heartbreaking songs ever written.
